ygData.subject: Re: RE: Smiths of Norrath
ygData.msgSnippet: Sadly, banded on E ci also sells for about 1pp per AC, mostly due to the efforts on Escapee I believe. What I d like to do is collect the stats on all pieces
ygData.messageBody:
Sadly, banded on E'ci also sells for about 1pp per AC, mostly due to the efforts on "Escapee" I believe. What I'd like to do is collect the stats on all pieces of bronze (total AC and total weight) and have that handy to give to the whiners who say "But I can buy bronze for 2pp per AC, and it's better!". FACT: Banded is lighter. FACT: Banded is generally only one point of AC less per piece than bronze. I love watching these high elves loaded with full bronze trying to keep up with their guides.

Haniel: Got a loc for those mold vendors? Also, have you checked the dwarf vendors in ButcherBlock just outside of Kelethin for molds? I always figured the woman should have some, as she's standing next to a NPC forge :)

I checked the banded and misc. smithing vendors in Kelethin to see if they had any new molds, none detected.

Araman of E'ci
17th level Paladin
Skill 142 smith
